title: Destiny Born
description: Wolf shifter, daughter, sister, and princess of the frozen North.My life’s purpose has been this, to one day unite the kingdoms of The North and The South.Snow and heat, ice and fire. Complete opposites.I left days ago with the southern ambassador, journeying south to meet my betrothed, Prince Jael Virac.My hopes for the future of our kingdoms were dashed when I was nearly killed, leaving me broken and on the run.A bleeding wolf, lost and afraid in the wilderness of Terra Mor… until he found me. The hunter of Shadowers, and the dark creature of my dreams.Fantastical world building, wolf shifters, faeries, vampires, dragons, and fated mates! Abigail Grant creates adventures of fantasy, epic romance and all things paranormal. Enemies to lovers readers delight!This series is not reverse harem, and is appropriate for Young Adults, College age, and NA!Readers of K.F. Breene, Ilona Andrews, Kelly St. Claire, Leia Stone, Elizabeth Briggs, Linsey Hall, and Jen L. Grey love this urban fantasy fae/shifter romance!
author: Abigail Grant
